name: Exsense Dynamix
short_description:
Exsense Dynamix is a simple, fast, free and easy content management system to create small web sites.

Exsense Dynamix implemented in two sections named Dynamix CMS and Dynamix Admin.
Dynamix CMS is a web application and responsed to display content to user.
Dynamix Admin is control panel and responsed to manage contents.

Dynamix CMS is a web application in PHP or ASP.NET versions and Dynamix Admin is a desktop application in Microsoft.NET Framework or Mono Framework versions.

By Exsense Dynamix you achieve a web site and you can manage it from desktop environment by rich desktop application.
summary: Exsense Dynamix is a simple, fast, free and easy CMS
